usefulItems: bowl, thermal serving bowl or other large bowl, piping bag with round nozzle (1 cm), large saucepan, scissors, slotted spoon, stove top
title: Carrot gnocchi with zucchini cream

ingredients.content: 100 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm), plus extra shaved, to serve
500 g water, plus extra for boiling
500 g carrots, cut into thin rounds (5 mm)
600 g zucchini, cut into cubes (1 cm)
2 ½ tsp salt, plus extra to season
1 sprig fresh basil, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position and weigh carrots into it. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.

Place Varoma tray into position, then weigh zucchini onto it, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer zucchini into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and cover to keep warm. Set carrots aside to cool for 10 minutes. Discard cooking liquid. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place egg, 1 teaspoon of the salt, reserved carrots and reserved Parmesan into mixing bowl and blend <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and mix <b>5 sec/speed 3<b>. Transfer carrot mixture into a piping bag fitted with a round nozzle (1 cm) and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place a large saucepan with water (approx. 2 litres) over high heat and bring to the boil. Meanwhile, continue with next step while water comes to the boil.
Place eschalots and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add  ½ teaspoon of the salt, 1 pinch of the pepper and two-thirds (approx. 400 g) of the reserved zucchini and cook <b>2 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, then mix <b>20 sec/speed 6<b>.
Add remaining zucchini and and mix <b>10 sec//speed 1<b>.

Once water is boiling, add remaining 1 teaspoon salt. Pipe gnocchi mixture (3 cm lengths) into saucepan, using scissors to snip gnocchi pieces. Gnocchi will rise to the surface when cooked (approx. 2 minutes). Using a slotted spoon, remove cooked gnocchi and place into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and cover to keep warm.
Divide reserved sauce between 4 serving bowls, top with gnocchi and garnish with basil leaves, Parmesan shavings and remaining pepper before serving.
